title: Installation issue: superlu-dist on NERSC Cori w/ Intel 19.1.1.217
body:
Using `spack@develop` (3-Aug, 4c97a0ea1cbcb42fff4cb2183552b6b6c441d791) on **NERSC Cori** (`cray-cnl7-haswell`) with `%intel@19.1.1.217`:

`superlu-dist` spec: [superlu-dist.spec.yaml.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/5030232/superlu-dist.spec.yaml.txt)
Build log: [superlu-dist-build-out.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/5030242/superlu-dist-build-out.txt)

```
$> spack install -f ./superlu-dist.spec.yaml
...
==> Installing superlu-dist
==> superlu-dist: Executing phase: 'cmake'
...
==> Error: ProcessError: Command exited with status 1:
```
